类 Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape
  • 直接已知子类:
    Circle, Square, Triangle

    public class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    The Shape class is used to model general shapes.
    版本:
    1.8
    作者:
    zhouzihan

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      int[] getX()
      a method to retrieve the x-coordinates of the vertices in its local coordinate system
      int[] getY()
      a method to retrieve the y-coordinates of the vertices in its local coordinate system
      void rotate(double dt)
      a method to rotate the shape about its center
      void setVertices(double d)
      a method to set the local coordinates of the vertices of a shape a dummy method, supposed to be overridden in the subclasses
      void translate(double dx, double dy)
      a method for translating the center of the shape in the screen coordinate system

    • 方法详细资料

      • setVertices

        public void setVertices(double d)
        a method to set the local coordinates of the vertices of a shape a dummy method, supposed to be overridden in the subclasses
        参数:
        d - The value used to denotes the local coordinates of the vertices of a shape

      • translate

        public void translate(double dx,
                      double dy)
        a method for translating the center of the shape in the screen coordinate system
        参数:
        dx - translate the shape along the x directions
        dy - translate the shape along the y directions

      • rotate

        public void rotate(double dt)
        a method to rotate the shape about its center
        参数:
        dt - denotes the angle of rotating

      • getX

        public int[] getX()
        a method to retrieve the x-coordinates of the vertices in its local coordinate system
        返回:
        the x-coordinates of the vertices in the screen coordinate system

      • getY

        public int[] getY()
        a method to retrieve the y-coordinates of the vertices in its local coordinate system
        返回:
        the y-coordinates of the vertices in the screen coordinate system
